import Head from 'next/head'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import { Box, Flex, Button, Text } from 'rebass'; import { Label, Input } from '@rebass/forms'; import styles from '../styles/Home.module.css'; export default function Home() { const router = useRouter() const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const form = e.target const pt = form.pt.value const fh = form.fh.value const fv = form.fv.value const fd = form.fd.value const fa = form.fa.value const ff = form.ff.value const fg = form.fg.value const result = pt * fh * fv * fd * fa * ff * fg router.push(`/explanation?result=${result}`) } return (
